customer_name: F E A R and Center for Education Inc
site_name: F E A R and Center for Education Inc

citations.narrative:
In the enclosure housing four marmosets, there are multiple metal, trellis-like structures that the animals climb on that
show evidence of excessive rust. The bars of these structures have rusted to the point where the metal has deteriorated,
leaving holes with sharp edges.
Excessive rust can compromise structural strength, present roughened and jagged surfaces where it is possible for the
animal to injure themselves, and prevent proper cleaning and sanitization of a surface. Any surfaces that come in contact
with the nonhuman primates must be free of excessive rust that prevents the required cleaning and sanitization, or that
affects the structural strength of the surface.
To be corrected by May 31, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.75(c)(1)(i) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
In the enclosure housing four marmosets, there are multiple metal, trellis-like structures that the animals climb on that 
show evidence of excessive rust. The bars of these structures have rusted to the point where the metal has deteriorated, 
leaving holes with sharp edges. 
 
Excessive rust can compromise structural strength, present roughened and jagged surfaces where it is possible for the 
animal to injure themselves, and prevent proper cleaning and sanitization of a surface. Any surfaces that come in contact 
with the nonhuman primates must be free of excessive rust that prevents the required cleaning and sanitization, or that 
affects the structural strength of the surface. 
 
To be corrected by May 31, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
